div.style: display: flex; align-items: flex-start; flex-direction: row; justify-content: center
display: flex; position: relative; align-items: center; flex-direction: row
display: flex; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; font-weight: bold; line-height: 24px; white-space: nowrap
display: {firstLabelDisPlay}; height: 32px; align-items: center; flex-direction: row; margin-right: 6px; border-radius: 8px; background-color: {firstLabelBgColor}

label.style: overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; color: {firstLabelColor}; font-size: 26px; margin: 2px 5px; align-self: center; font-weight: bold
display: {etaInfoDisPlay}; color: {etaInfoColor}; font-size: 26px; font-weight: bold; align-self: flex-start
